response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Should you find this proposal appealing, please let me know, and we can proceed with the details of the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
